text: Paris Community Unit School District No. 4 (Paris CUSD 4) is a school district headquartered in Paris, Illinois. It operates a single school, Crestwood School. It serves small portions of the Paris city limits and most of the surrounding unincorporated areas, as well as Vermilion."SCHOOL DISTRICT REFERENCE MAP (2010 CENSUS): Edgar County, IL" (Archive). U.S. Census Bureau.
